list_description: List of Netlabel and Creative Commons related resources

resources.name: Netlabel Day
resources.description: The annual event celebrating netlabel culture every July 14th. Every year labels participate and release free music releases specifically for the event to help celebrate.

resources.name: CC Community Music Awards
resources.description: The annual award event that shines a spotlight on Creative Commons music excellence.

resources.name: ccMixter
resources.description: A community site that encourages the use of Creative Commons licensed remixable music resources through content hosting and special remix events.

resources.name: Internet Archive Netlabels
resources.description: This extensive archive has been archiving netlabels and their releases since 2003.

resources.name: Netlabel Archive
resources.description: This important archive is dedicated to preserving the information and music of inactive netlabels. It features an extensive archive of Monotonik, one of the original netlabels which was active from 1996 to 2009.

resources.name: Starfrosch.com
resources.description: Great Creative Commons music resource featuring 24/7 radio streams and the #hot111 chart.

resources.name: Netwaves.org
resources.description: A podcast specializing in spotlighting great Creative Commons music.

resources.name: Musique Libre
resources.description: A French language non-profit organization focused on spreading the word about free culture and sharing.

resources.name: Rynothebearded #OO Top 10
resources.description: A weekly podcast where they recap the top tracks as decided by the voters of the #OO chat.

resources.name: clongclongmoo.org
resources.description: Blog spotlighting the latest netlabel releases.

resources.name: Netlabel Interview Project
resources.description: Blog focusing on interviewing netlabels with a commons set of questions in order to document the culture of netlabels.

resources.name: Netlabels.org
resources.description: The original Netlabel information resource and guide which still features newly posted blog posts every now and then.

resources.name: Dogmazic
resources.description: Music archive site affiliated with Musique Libre featuring an extensive catalogue of copyleft licensed music releases.

resources.name: Machtdose
resources.description: A German language podcast featuring Creative Commons music.

resources.name: Scene.org
resources.description: The archive houses the largest demoscene file repository and has been active since 1996. It also contains many netlabels and releases.

resources.name: Radio Brennpunkt
resources.description: Radio Brennpunkt is streaming Internet radio playing a mix of unusual music, sound art, live shows, and other fringe programming. All audio content is either in the public domain or presented with explicit permission from the creator or copyright holder.

resources.name: CC TRAX
resources.description: Extensive blog/archive spreading the good word about CC music. A great central location to catch up with and download a diverse selection of Creative Commons licensed music by CC artists and netlabels.
